title: Update Contact page: make contact-info section white and keep form text black

requirements.text: Update the Contact page so the entire Contact Information section (including its headings and the Email/Location/WhatsApp values/links) renders in white text, while keeping the Contact page header ("Get In Touch" + subtitle) unchanged.

quotes: the whole contact‑info section including headings but not the from,because from background is white.

acceptanceCriteria: On /contact, the "Contact Information" card’s heading text and all contact info labels/values (Email, Location, WhatsApp) display in white.
The Email and WhatsApp remain clickable links and still work (mailto link for email; wa.me link for WhatsApp).
The Contact page header ("Get In Touch" and its subtitle) remains as it currently appears (no color/style changes).

requirements.text: Update the Contact form UI so the form area uses black text (including the form title/description, labels, and user-entered input/textarea text) because the form background is white/light, while preserving existing validation and submit-success/error messaging behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On /contact, the contact form’s title/description and all field labels render in black.
Text typed into the Name/Email/Subject inputs and Message textarea renders in black.
Form validation errors and submit success/error status messages still appear correctly and remain readable.
No changes are made to the backend submission behavior; the form still submits as before.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable shadcn UI sources); achieve styling changes via page/component composition and className overrides in app-owned components.
Do not modify backend schema or contact submission storage logic (single-actor backend remains unchanged).
nonGoals: Changing Contact page header styling/text beyond keeping it unchanged.
Adding new contact fields or changing contact form validation rules.
Any deployment/republish steps (not requested beyond applying the UI changes).
